attributes.action: stop pushing through legislation relating to 'green' issues
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop any legislation to do with 'green' issues as no-one actually knows whats going on with the worlds climate.
Since the creation of the Earth temperatures have waxed and wained and you can no sooner stop it than you can stop rain falling from the sky.  To bring in hair brained taxations etc based on guesswork is just a way of governments raising more money from their electors.  If you really believe the hype do something about the built in life of consumables so not so many need to be made and resources wasted.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
